inclusion.criterion: Previously untreated newly diagnosed patients with MM (stage II-III)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status 0-1
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Platelet count ≥ 100 x 10^9/L (pretreatment platelet transfusion is not allowed, while transfusion during the treatment is permitted)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Hemoglobin ≥ 8 g/dL (≥ 4.96 mol/L), Prior RBC transfusion or recombinant human erythropoietin use is allowed
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Adequate liver function (bilirubin < UNL(Upper Normal Limit) x 2 and ALT/AST < UNL x 3)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Adequate renal function (serum creatinine < UNL x 1.5 or creatine clearance > 60 ml/min)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Signed the informed consent, have the will and ability to follow the protocol
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of allergic reaction attributable to compounds containing boron or mannitol
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known hypersensitivity to thalidomide or dexamethasone
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Peripheral neuropathy or neuropathic pain Grade 2 or higher as defined by NCI CTCAE version 3
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Uncontrolled or severe cardiovascular disease, including MI within 6 months of enrollment, New York Heart Association (NYHA) Class III or IV heart failure, uncontrolled angina, clinically significant pericardial disease, or cardiac amyloidosis
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Acute severe infection requiring antibiotic therapy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Previous cancer history (except in situ carcinoma of cervix or basal cell cancer of skin)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Active ulcer detected by gastroscopy (gastroscopy is not routine in all patients, only to patients with symptoms of ulcer disease and/or history of previous ulcer therapy and/or physician's discretion)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with recurrent disease and systemic amyloidosis. She has a history of allergic reaction to thalidomide, uncontrolled cardiovascular disease, and is pregnant.
